title: All She Wants for Valentine's Day
description: "A Valentine's Day romance that's hot, hot hot!"***Note: due to sexual content, this book recommended for 17+*After you've been hurt, how long does it take to move on? ...How do you learn how to trust again?From bestselling romance author NATHAN STRATTON comes a brand-new erotic romance, just in time for Valentine's Day.Tanya's been unlucky in love, and she has absolutely zero interest in hearts, Cupids, flowers or any of that romantic mumbo-jumbo. That is, until Ryan steps into her life... If you loved All She Wants for XXX-Mas and All She Wants for New Year's, you'll love this satisfying last book in the trilogy. Warning: Extra Spicy!!
author: Nathan Stratton
